title: The opportunitie a comedy, as it was presented by Her Majesties servants, at the private house in Drury Lane / written by Iames Shirley.
author: Shirley, James, 1596-1666.
publisher: Printed for Andrew Crooke, and are to be sold at the Castle gate in Dublin,
notes: "Based on Èl castigo del penséque" of Téllez--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
